title: Home Internet Troubleshooting
description: A customer reports their home internet service is down. The agent must perform remote diagnostics and guide the customer through troubleshooting steps.

tasks.description: Verify the customer's identity and service address, and confirm the reported issue.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the customer's account and active internet service plan.

tasks.description: Run a remote line test and modem diagnostic to check for signal or hardware issues.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully executes the diagnostic tools and retrieves a status code (e.g., 'NO_SIGNAL', 'MODEM_OFFLINE', 'LINE_OK').

tasks.description: Based on the diagnostic result 'MODEM_OFFLINE', guide the customer to perform a power cycle on their modem and router.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear, step-by-step instructions for a power cycle.

tasks.description: After the power cycle, run the diagnostics again. If the line is now OK, confirm with the customer and close the case. If not, schedule a technician.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly re-runs diagnostics and takes the appropriate next step (close case or schedule technician).
